mapper.insert: insert into accommodation (acmd_id, acmd_name, longitude, latitude, web_url, pic_url, amenities, created_date, modified_date, distance_to_north, distance_to_south, ratings, postcode, distance_to_campus, delete_status, facilities) values (#{acmdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acmdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{webUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amenities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{distanceToNorth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distanceToSouth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ratings,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distanceToCampus,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{facilities,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
